Name: name
Text: Jonas

Name: d_place
Text: Earth

Name: d_tokki
Text: Generally high abilities, but this isn't apparent.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Was on a legendary ship almost 1000 years ago.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Owner of interstellar cruiser "D.Q.O.".

Name: d_tokki
Text: Former space exploration age hero; current weirdo.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Has a strong affinity for Kukrushka.

Name: d_tokki
Text: As a video game addict, was a hermit for 100 years.

Name: d_tokki
Text: Worships Kukrushka as a "sacred miracle doll".

Name: t_aisatu
Text: I am {0}. Greetings.

Name: t_suspect
Text:
What we need to do is clear: purge the {0}.
One could even say that it's my solemn duty...

Name: t_suspect
Text:
You sure are being talkative, {0}
Some sort of... camouflage, perhaps?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Blossoming into full believability...
Is {0} perhaps a flower of betrayal?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
{0}. Staying quiet will only exacerbate the situation.
Nay... perhaps that's exactly what you want?

Name: t_suspect
Text:
We now must rely on logical consequence.
Yes, probability states that {0} should be target of suspicion...

Name: t_suspect
Text:
What's the matter, {0}?
Come, don't hold it all in - share with us...

Name: t_suspect
Text:
{0}. Our alliance has fizzled to its end.
Now I am not betraying you, you see.
You... YOU betrayed JONAS!

Name: t_suspect
Text:
Last night's attack on {1}...
I hereby accuse... {0} of this heinous act of treachery!

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Presently... from inside my guts sprouts a bud of doubt toward {0}.
I just may let it blossom into full bloom!

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Your silvery tongue is indeed sharp, {0}.
Perhaps even, dare I say it, super-duper sharp...?

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
An attack on {0} would not likely be met with substantial resistance.
This... is my Rubicon.
Lo! {0}! I hereby full-on accuse thee!

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Persisting in silence is {0}'s way.
However... in such dire straits as these, it is simply not cool.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Our suspicions should be chucked toward {0}.
As much as my balls do feel kicked to say it, alas, it's true.

Name: t_suspect_r
Text:
Further contemplation tells me that {0} is, indeed, sketchy.
Hehe, 'tis said: "A wise man changes his mind; a dumbass... like, doesn't."

Name: t_suspect_add
Text:
My sixth sense has been whispering in my ear.
"Do not trust {0}," it warns.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Maybe it's just my feelings toward {0}...?
But it's just as {1} said not a moment ago.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Methinks {0} doth spout bullshit too much.
Hm, maybe it's from fear of being purged...?

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
I agree.
{0} is akin to a snake in one's own bosom.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Hiding in the shadows, waiting to pounce, are we?
Well not today, {0}. Hah! Not. To-day...

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
Well, {0}?
Has {1}'s assessment not hit the mark right on the... mark...?

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
I do harbor my own doubts about {0}...
I can feel it; something squishy, in my very guts.

Name: t_suspect_t0
Text:
What say you, {0}? Does it not torment you so?
You've made an enemy of me, hence...
SUCK IT.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
For {1}...
I shall submit my approval of a purge of the scoundrel {0}!

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Tis said that the tongue wounds more than a lance.
Thus I, too, shall be wary of Lance - and his tongue.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text: {0} is our ENEMY, you say?! Well, yeah, OK, I get that...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Hah! I see you waver, {0}.
Hehe, yes, and WAVER, you SHALL... or something.

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Mathematically speaking, {0} draws suspicion...
'Tis said the mathematics is the king of scholarship...
And the king is, like, super smart...

Name: t_suspect_t1
Text:
Oh, how I pity you, {0}.
To be doubted by someone such as me...

Name: t_suspected0
Text:
As much doubt as you seem to cast upon me, I assure you...
I'm heaping it upon myself pretty hardcore, too.

Name: t_suspected0
Text:
Lo! What is this, now?
Hehe, I seem to have fallen out of favor.

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
To believe or not to believe {0}...
Should we not choose to believe, lacking evidence otherwise?

Name: t_hanron0
Text:
So {0} is suspicious, say you...
But are these words spoken by {1} in verity?
Or... like... NOT verity...?

Name: t_hanron1
Text:
Lo! The gamble has begun.
To bet my chips on "Yeah, {0} is cool".

Name: t_hanron_t0
Text:
I, too, place my trust in {0}.
I mean, like, comparatively.

Name: t_hanron_t1
Text:
Ah! So {0} is not to be the object of our doubt, you say?
Interesting. Yeah sure, I'm down, bro.

Name: t_trust
Text:
{0}... My friend and companion.
Trust you, I shall. Natch.

Name: t_trust
Text:
I can hear the whispers of logical conclusion...
They say, "Yup, trust {0}."

Name: t_trust
Text:
The compass of my heart points straight to {0}.
Let us trust {0} in full!

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Alas... {0}, I trust you.
I believe you shall lead me to the promised land...

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
And now, for a directional shift. I believe {0}.
I mean, it's like, only logical and stuff, right?

Name: t_trust_r
Text:
Do your hearts not tire running the marathon that is doubt?
{0}, I quench my thirst with the electrolytes of "trusting you"!

Name: t_trust_t0
Text:
I trust {0}... I guess.
OK, fine. Yeah. Definitely.

Name: t_trust_t1
Text:
I agree.
I myself am not fit to disbelieve the mouth sounds of {0}.

Name: t_trusted0
Text: Lo! A comfy wind bloweth right up in my face!

Name: t_thanron0
Text:
Just what could lead one to trust the words of {0}?
Alas, I have no idea like, whatsoever.

Name: t_thanron1
Text:
To believe {0}. A proposal too attractive to accept.
Attractive, like... um... a flower... with... Thorns! That's it!

Name: t_thanron_t0
Text:
The trusting heart is a thing of beauty...
But sometimes, it's also, like... super wrong, or something.

Name: t_thanron_t1
Text:
How I wish that I, too, could trust one unconditionally.
As I did that time... You know, that one time... Uh...

Name: t_hosho
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is the true {1}.

Name: t_hosho
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is human.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is like, totally not {1}.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is {1}!

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is {1}. 100%.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is nothing other than {1}.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is a liar, liar... Pants... on fire.

Name: t_hosho_enemy
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed...
{0} is not Gnosia, and yet, also, totally fibbing, though.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
{0}. This proves nothing.
C'mon, try harder, buddy.

Name: t_hosho_miss
Text:
Alas, {0}, as a wise man once said, "no doy".
Have you not something else you maybe wanna spit out?

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
I thank you for that, {0}.
My righteousness hath doth... beenth... proventh...ed.

Name: t_hosho_get
Text:
Thus, it hath been... proventh...ed... I guess.
Hehe, nice one, {0}.

Name: t_tohyo_go
Text:
This silence... It comforts me.
One last savory taste of you guys shutting up before the vote.

Name: t_tohyo_mae
Text: Hark! The bells of "time to vote, y'all" ring loud and true!

Name: t_tohyo_sai
Text:
A second vote, eh?
So like, for {0}, right?

Name: t_shokei
Text:
Hehe... I'm personally quite fond of silence myself.
To sleep - perchance to dream... Hell yeah, let's do it.

Name: t_shokei
Text:
And now... to dream.
A true dream, no longer tinged by lies...

Name: t_wakare
Text:
{0} - my friend...
May the bumper cars of fate let us bonk heads once again.

Name: t_karare
Text:
Aha! So you finally show yourself before me, {0}.
Now, let us play!

Name: t_imjinro
Text:
Away withy the filthy world! We shall play in Paradise!
Hahahahaha! {0} is absolutely the scene, you guys!

Name: t_shori
Text:
{0} is no more; 'tis known.
Now, my time of childlike play must also end...

Name: t_tohyo_kurikaeshi
Text:
Ah, so a decision cannot be reached...
What to do,what to do...?

Name: t_tohyo_jeno
Text:
Fear not, {0}.
After you have been put to sleep, I shall take over in your stead.
Now you need only take a chilly little nap, 'kay?

Name: t_tohyo_alive
Text: Let us remain calm and await our enemy's next move.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ok
Text:
Ah, yes.
To the ice box for all. I, too, shall place my chips on this bid.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_ng
Text:
Lo! 'Tis said: Waste makes... I mean, Hasty waste is... Uh...
Let's just not do this, 'kay guys?

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ok
Text:
Ah, a vote to watch events unfold, I see?
A brave proposition indeed. I'm down.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_ng
Text:
Yeah, like, no.
Not gonna do it.

Name: t_tohyo_jeno_kettei
Text:
{0}.
In all honestly, I envy you all.
Rest in peace.

Name: t_tohyo_alive_kettei
Text:
It seems calmer heads have prevailed.
Hehe, if nothing else we have bravery in spades.

Name: t_tohyo_hitei
Text:
Ah, so you dig not my modest proposal, I see?
Fine then, whatever. I'm not angry. YOU'RE angry...

Name: t_tohyo_dame
Text:
Tis time...
And now, to bravely do nothing!

Name: t_co
Text:
Tis I, the {0}. Hehe, don't I look spiffy?
I shall seek out those tainted by the dread Gnosia...

Name: t_co
Text:
It would seem as though the {0} is I... For some reason, I guess.
I shall check the crispy frozen ones for Gnosial infection.
Should be easy enough, right?

Name: t_co
Text:
On this ship travels a {0} sent directly from... The GOVERNMENT!
In case that wasn't clear, I'm talking about me.

Name: t_co
Text:
At our previous port, I remained onboard the ship.
I had, like, you know... Stuff to do.
Therefore, cast your doubt not upon me, but... other dudes!

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text:
Hark! The {0} reports!
{1} has become one with the Gnosia!
Should you need proof, I'll totally show you my work...

Name: t_co_find
Text:
As {0}, I examined the hard, frozen guts of those in cold sleep.
An lo! {1}, who sleeps so frostily, hath tur-ned GNOSIA!

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_find
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
Nope. I'm the {0}.
No, for real though. I'M the {0}.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
{1}. If you are {0} as you claim, then what of I?
Hehe, you are aware in full, are you not?
I am JONAS! This ship's {0}, duh.

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text:
I shall vouch for {1}.
I, too, remained onboard this ship.
Let {1} and Jonas form... an ALLIANCE!

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_taiko
Text: dammy

Name: t_co_req
Text:
Hehe, calm down, and take it easy.
Lo! The time has come to announce yourself, {0}!

Name: t_co_after
Text:
So, only one claimant to the role of {0}, hm?
Let us raise a toast to the bravery of {1}!

Name: t_co_after
Text:
Ah, but WAIT...!
This ship is only supposed to have ONE {0}! So, you know...

Name: t_co_after
Text:
Hehe, look...
Tempted by the fruit called {0}, the enemy shows itself unwittingly...

Name: t_uranai_o
Text: So our enemy is indeed among us... Sweet.

Name: t_uranai_s
Text: Allow me, as a master of my field, to REPORT!

Name: t_uranai_b
Text: And now, you guys... a REPORT!

Name: t_uranai_t
Text:
{1} is... Hehe, should I say it? For real?
'Tis true! {1} is a dirty, filthy, creepy {0}!

Name: t_uranai_f
Text:
{1} could not possibly be {0}. HOW-EVER...
That's, uh... actually all I got.

Name: t_uranai_n
Text: My research has concluded.

Name: t_reibai_s
Text:
The frozen, icy human body is a beautiful thing.
I kinda messed it up with my "examination", though.

Name: t_reibai_t
Text: I hereby... RE-PORT! {1} {3} {0}.

Name: t_reibai_f
Text: I hereby... RE-PORT! {1} {3} not {0}.

Name: t_reibai_ff
Text: RE-PORT! {1} {3} not {0}.

Name: t_houkoku_s
Text: You... totally ripped off my results, didn't you...?

Name: t_houkoku_w
Text: From me, a resounding NOPE! A-HA! The fiend's facade crumbles!

Name: t_okuyami
Text:
RE-PORT! {0} has been... victimized.
Cause of death: GNOSIA!

Name: t_okuyami_n
Text:
No victims recorded.
Our enemy's loss is our victory.
Hehe, sweeeet...

Name: t_okuyami_f
Text:
Two recorded victims... {0}.
One was apparently, uh... you know...

Name: t_houkoku_req
Text:
Come now... Offer up your RE-PORT!
Pretty please?

Name: t_houkoku_not
Text:
Lo! {0}... Have you no RE-PORT?
Or could it be that... You are somehow unable to RE-PORT?!

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
To find the truth, one must first reveal their own.
I hereby swear before you all: I am HU-MAN!

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Hm... Let it be known.
I, my own self, am, indeed... HU-MAN!

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
A declaration of humanity, you say?
This I cannot abide. Because... reasons.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
To think that all would agree not to such a declaration...!
Well, that just sucks.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
Wait, so... is that it?
There are those amongst us who have yet to speak up.
This is... not cool at all!

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
To think that all would agree to make such a bold declaration...
I mean, yeah, great, I guess.

Name: t_skill_sayNingen
Text:
What's the matter, {0}? Your emotions run hot!
Are you, perhaps... ACTING?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
You all look so weakened and weary...
Have you perchance not been taking in enough... yummies?

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Ah yes, love...
Let us speak of that which sways our very existence!

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Our own eradication from this universe...
There is nothing so frightful as this.
The true terror; to... be no longer...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
The discovery of new cuisine trumps that of a new star...
I mean, you can't munch on a star, so... yeah.

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Should the opportunity present itself, I, too, may fall in love.
Like, immediately...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
In the synthetic plant lab, I laid eyes upon it...
A plant, combined with glistening, white flesh...
In shape, it was almost... human...

Name: t_skill_zatsudan
Text:
Fellow crew, 'tis all well and good to get all... friendly-like.
But we really gotta sort out this Gnosia stuff, you guys.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
All those who claimed to be the {0}. Hear my words, one and all.
The sacrifice you make today shall not be forgotten by mankind.
Freeze 'em ALL!

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
In doing so, are we guaranteed to eliminate our enemy at once?
Not bad... Let us... Git 'er done.

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
So we are to toss away the {0}, as if they were mere tools?
Nay! This is not the sort of method which Daddy can abide!

Name: t_skill_roller
Text:
I, too, agree not with freezing them.
NOPE, say I! NOPE!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
According to one {1}, {0} is, indeed, Gnosia.
So, says I, we must do away with the scourge that is {0}.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Allow me to posit this to you all: Rememberest you mine RE-PORT?
In which I stated in no unclear language, that {0} is Gnosia?
Now I ask of you: Trust in me, and vote against {0}!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Fellows, cast your vote for {0}!
Let us cast those who would do us nasty into cold SLEEEEP!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
{1}... {1}.
You propose, based upon lies, that we should be rid of {0}...
Well, like, no. Just no. So there.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Hm... A PLAN, I see?
I love me a good plan. My vote shall be for {0}.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
So you would send me to the frosty, crispy naptime, would you?
Is this a joke? For you see me laugh not!

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Cast our votes for {0}, says you?
Well, that's just... nuh-uh.

Name: t_skill_doTohyo
Text:
Such a proposal, at such a moment in time...
Am I the only one to see through your... SHENANIGANS?

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
I see, this would seem to be the most appropriate move.
I hereby submit my promise NOT to vote for {0}, pinky swear.

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
No. We have no reason to remove {0} from the vote.
Or have we? Nay, we have not...

Name: t_skill_dontTohyo
Text:
Tis a shame, {1}.
Your proposal lacks a certain... something. Something, like... you know. Something.

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
I understand...
Let the Heavens and the Earth smile upon us.
{0}, let us kick in the bathroom door of fate - TOGETHER!

Name: t_skill_kyoryoku
Text:
Me? Joining forces with you?
'Tis but a dream. A silly, silly dream.

Name: t_skill_t_doui
Text:
Hm, there is indeed good reason to give {0}'s opinion import.
Let us all hear said opinion, with our own respective earballs!

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
I, too, have been thinking the same.
Allowing {1} to roam free would put us all in mortal PERIL!

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
Hehe... Alright.
For my dear friend {1}, I, Jonas, shall place my very ass on the proverbial "line".

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
I, too, agree with {2}.
Feel you not that {0}'s opinion stumbles far from the path of sense-making?!

Name: t_skill_t_kyakushoku
Text:
Ah... I could not conceive a vote for {1}.
Do we all not agree?

Name: t_skill_h_uyamuya
Text:
Do away with petty arguments, and open thine earballs!
Hark! Can you not hear the stars as they sing...?

Name: t_skill_h_help
Text:
Before seeking help from another, try helpin' yourself, bro.
Therein lies the key to looking not like a damn freeloader.

Name: t_skill_dogeza
Text:
Ah, the art of groveling in desperation.
An art I had thought was long lost.
Witness, a true artist at work…

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe... Bwahahahahaaa!
That I myself could be an enemy of humanity!
If this is so, then I ask you... What, exactly, am I...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Waste not your energy, {0}.
Your sentence has been declared, and shall be now carried out.
Y'all ready for this?!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Make an enemy of me, and how long do you believe you would last?
Hehe... This is gonna be fun, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
This is a hunt! A hunt for the most dangerous game...
Just as we, as humans, have lived for eons.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, place you not your trust in me, Jonas?
Hehe, you could place a much worse bet...

Name: t_personal
Text:
What's wrong, my old friend?
Your pain is my pain. Let it all out, homie!

Name: t_personal
Text:
To trust is to be betrayed.
To love is to be betrayed.
Hehe, damn... this is a hard one.

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, I am your ally.
I mean... you know.
Truth or lie, dream or reality... Know you not which? Hehehehe.

Name: t_personal
Text:
According to that which mine eyeballs hath seen... {0}.
Art thou not mine ENEMY?!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Tonight... is the night.
Gonna make some sacrifices and feel alright.

Name: t_personal
Text:
You for I, and I for you...
Hehe, sounds good. We are now brethren in war!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Victory falls upon the elbows of the mantis!
'Tis now the time for {0}, in search of the wigglybum dancer?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Waste not your energy, {0}.
Your sentence has been declared, and shall be now carried out.
Y'all ready for this?!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Now, let us toast!
To strange encounters, surpassing space and time!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Have you come solely to doubt my intentions?
Hehe, cautious - I like that.

Name: t_personal
Text:
I cannot understand. Why would you make an enemy of me?
That's, like... super dangerous, bro...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Let the records show, we now begin our anti-Gnosian venture!
The circumstances are vague, and our chances are, well... Let's just do it.

Name: t_personal
Text:
The truth can be found within a lie.
This applies especially to us now.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yes, {1}, indeed, speaks lies. BUT!
These lies shall lead us to the TRUTH!
The truth that {1} is totally an enemy of HUMANITY!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe, the truth can be a cruel thing indeed...
{1} has taken on the cross.
'Tis now up to us to carry out the burial.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Lo, {0}!
The believers are heading off to the gallows as we speak!

Name: t_personal
Text: Loo loo-loo-loo loooo, Loo loo-loo-loo loooo...

Name: t_personal
Text:
The stormwinds blow...
The stormwinds known as... GNOSIA.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yes. We humans...
We must huddle together to wait out the storms of, um... naughtiness...

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}, oh {0}.
Let us join together in our struggle against that which is bad and naughty!

Name: t_personal
Text:
DETERMINATION!
You chose... wisely. Nice one, bro.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hm...
I mean, fine, BE like that then...

Name: t_personal
Text:
You must forge your own path.
I only pray that said path does not, like... be... bad?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ah, so you wish to lean upon the wisdom of Jonas.
To decide whom shall be disappeared on this night...

Name: t_personal
Text:
Well then... How's about {1}?
Seems like a nice, crunchy lil' Gnosia snack, eh?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe... I cannot wait for the warp.
The pleasure in seeing {1} gone. The heart trembles in anticipation.

Name: t_personal
Text:
(Oh, {1}. You're the one.
 You are now with eternity…)

Name: t_personal
Text:
I, Jonas, hath been...
Been... like, written about... In poems... and stuff.

Name: t_personal
Text:
And now, as tragedy strikes this very ship...
Once again I deliver inspiration to another generation of poets!

Name: t_personal
Text:
{0}. You should be proud.
After all, it was you, {0}, who fought together with JONAS!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Let the record show that the Gnosia pose no more threat.
The danger has passed. Like, totally passed. For realsies.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ah...
And so it ends.
Good work. Good work indeed, {0}.

Name: t_personal
Text:
While enemies, we escaped the fatal claws of the Gnosia together.
The enemy of my enemy is, like... not so bad after all.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Now, {0}. Let us raise a toast!
A toast to... nice... stuff!

Name: t_personal
Text:
To VICTORY!
And also, to the friendships fostered among this mortal danger!

Name: t_personal
Text:
HOWEVER...
While they may be our enemy, I pity the Gnosia.

Name: t_personal
Text:
The moment they set foot on this, my ship...
Their fate had been sealed. Like, in a super bad way, too.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Humans find strength in numbers.
But if something foreign and malicious were to join those numbers...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Hehe... Behold! This is what happens.
The great Gnosia know humans all too well.

Name: t_personal
Text:
So, is this the end?
Heh... Worthless, cowardly humans.
As a former human, one almost feels shame.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Ah, how I long to see the very face of Gnos for myself one day.
Maybe even... as an innocent little girl.
I mean, what other way is there?

Name: t_personal
Text:
Now, to take care of the frozen, frosty humans.
I've got something in mind for them.

Name: t_personal
Text:
Let the record state!
With the human scourge reduced, the Gnosia hath WON!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yes, the fruits of our labors are ripe, and they fall from the tree now.
Let's dominate some HUMANS!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Have you ever thought that, maybe, like...
The world is just a reflection on the back of your eyelids...
And when you open your eyes, it all disappears...?

Name: t_personal
Text:
There are those who call me a Bug... But it is not so.
If I were to take on a name, it would be, "Illusion".

Name: t_personal
Text:
Yes - everything you know and see is but an illusion in my own eyeballs.
And now... wakey-wakey time!

Name: t_personal
Text:
Alright then... Goodbye.
Goodbye, my lovely illusions!

Name: t_personal
Text: This is absolute madness.

Name: t_personal
Text:
We, Gnosia, eradicate humanity.
And you, as a human, betray said humanity.
Wow, that's like, messed up, man.

Name: t_personal
Text:
However... Hehe, thanks!
I raise a toast to the madness of {0}!

Name: t_temp
Text:
Possesses generally high abilities.
However, possibly due to his chaotic personality,
these abilities are rarely put to actual use.
